events.Title: Rang-e-Sangram (Sthapana Divas)
events.Description: A themed Rangoli competition organized to celebrate 17 years of IIT Gandhinagar. Teams created vibrant rangoli designs showcasing creativity and teamwork. Audience voting added interactivity, and winning teams were awarded prizes.

events.Title: Hand Impression Activity (Sthapana Divas)
events.Description: A symbolic hand-impression activity celebrating IIT Gandhinagar’s 17-year journey. Each handprint represented unity, creativity, and collective pride, creating a memorable and meaningful artwork.

events.Title: Light Formation using Lanterns (Sthapana Divas)
events.Description: Students used paper lanterns to form a glowing "IITGN" formation, symbolizing unity and collective pride while ensuring safety by avoiding real flames.

events.Title: 17 Years Artwork & Doodle Your Canvas
events.Description: An open art activity featuring artwork from IITGN’s journey along with a doodling canvas where students expressed memories, thoughts, and creativity.

events.Title: Tiranga Rakhi Making Workshop and Competition
events.Description: Students created Tiranga-themed rakhis and gratitude messages for soldiers, which were later delivered to the BSF headquarters, creating a meaningful real-world impact.

events.Title: Art Exhibition and Fun Face-Drawing Activity
events.Description: An engaging art exhibition showcasing old artworks alongside a fun face-drawing activity that encouraged interaction and creativity among students.

events.Title: Paint Your X
events.Description: A collaborative art activity with TEDx where participants creatively painted the letter X using different styles, patterns, and colors.

events.Title: AI Video Making Competition
events.Description: An online AI-based video competition themed "Azadi From…" where students created humorous short videos using Google Gemini Pro AI.

events.Title: Paper Cup Ganesha Making Competition
events.Description: An eco-friendly Ganesh Chaturthi celebration where NYASA children created Lord Ganesha idols using paper cups and craft materials.

events.Title: Resin Keychain Making Workshop
events.Description: A hands-on workshop introducing students to resin art, where participants created customized resin keychains.

events.Title: Monthly Art Challenge Round 1
events.Description: A two-month art challenge encouraging consistent creativity through themed artworks.

events.Title: Clay Modelling Workshop
events.Description: A cultural clay modelling workshop conducted on the occasion of Onam, encouraging creativity and cultural appreciation.

events.Title: Live Sketching Workshop
events.Description: A beginner-friendly live sketching workshop focusing on proportions, perspective, and shading techniques.

events.Title: Diya Making Workshop
events.Description: A Diwali-themed workshop where participants learned to make and decorate diyas in a festive atmosphere.

events.Title: Sketch-a-Thon
events.Description: A live sketching competition organized during the Cultural Championship, encouraging quick thinking and artistic expression.

events.Title: Charcoal Chronicles
events.Description: A charcoal art competition where participants explored shading, textures, and expressive techniques.

events.Title: Combined Art Exhibition
events.Description: An exhibition showcasing artworks from multiple Palette events, celebrating diverse artistic styles and student creativity.

events.Title: UV Resin Pendant Making Workshop
events.Description: A follow-up resin workshop where participants designed unique pendants using UV resin.

events.Title: Internal Art Sessions for Club Members
events.Description: Skill-building internal sessions conducted by experienced members covering various art forms.

events.Title: Art Sessions for NYASA Kids
events.Description: Weekly art sessions conducted for NYASA children to encourage creativity and self-expression.

events.Title: Campus Art Walk
events.Description: Weekly campus sketching sessions helping students improve observation skills and artistic consistency.

events.Title: Monthly Art Challenge Round 2
events.Description: A continuation of the Monthly Art Challenge with new themes encouraging deeper exploration of artistic concepts.
